snippet: States are scrambling to replace the drugs used for executions, raising fresh questions about how the death penalty will be carried out.
abstract: States are scrambling to replace drugs used for executions, raising fresh questions about how the death penalty will be carried out; manufacturers are refusing to supply corrections departments with drugs they had been using.
lead_paragraph: States are scrambling to replace the drugs used for executions, raising fresh questions about how the death penalty will be carried out.

headline.main: Death Row Improvises, Lacking Lethal Mix
headline.print_headline: Death Row Improvises, Lacking Lethal Mix
